A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Sadly\, this is a bland action film full of out-of-frame gags\, one liners\, and disaster movie round robin cutting. Pointless\, two-dimensional characters are made all the more worse by weak plot points and lazy exposition.

However\, in a few scenes\, this film is gorgeous.  Without giving it away\, find a big screen with rich color\, and soak in some of the visuals.

Then drink every time a ship that can go light speed somehow can't catch up to a ship going below light speed.   You won't make it to the end...
